column5: There's not a lot of fly fishermen here...and this is a walleye forum, but what the heck:http://www.drakemag.com/back-issues/2017/summer/1791-chasing-pike-in-the-yukon-t......Daaayumm......but at pushing $8K for the weeks stay, prolly out of this guy's reach barring a dead rich uncle I don't know about...I doubt the $8K includes the plane trips to the isolated lakes.
